flawed_nl_solution:
The first sister has 5 pieces of clothing because 10 / 2 = <<10/2=5>>5
The next sister had 9 pieces of clothing because 10 + 2 = <<10+2=9>>9
The three youngest sisters combined have 24 pieces because 10 + 5 + 9 = <<10+5+9=24>>24
The oldest has 8 pieces because 24 / 3 = <<24/3=8>>8
Nicole ends up with 32 pieces of clothing because 10 + 5 + 9 + 8 = <<10+5+9+8=32>>32
#### 32

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 12, not 9. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
